meta.title: How NewNew Works
meta.description: Find out more about Events, Superpolls & Goals started by Creators on NewNew

intro.title: How NewNew works
intro.text:
First time? Here’s a quick rundown of the
things you can do on NewNew...

events.title: Events
events.text: You send bids to creators with what you want them to do and how much you’ll spend to see it happen. When the time’s up on the Event, the creator chooses their favorite bid and uploads a video of themselves doing it. You can come up with your own unique bid idea or back someone else’s bid to make sure it gets chosen.

superpolls.title: Superpolls
superpolls.text: These are paid polls. You vote on your favorite option and the creator will upload a video doing the option with the most amount of votes. You can also add your own options to the creator’s Superpoll if you subscribe to them... so basically, anything goes!

goals.title: Goals
goals.text: Back a creator’s Goal and watch it come to life. The creator sets a minimum amount of backers they need to reach their Goal. Goals are unique, interesting and fun. Believe us... this isn’t your typical crowdfunding campaign.
